title: Esther Approaches the King
summary: Esther is received favorably by the king and invites him and Haman to a banquet. She invites them again for a second banquet. Meanwhile, Haman builds a gallows to execute Mordecai, enraged by his defiance.

faq.question: What was Estherâ€™s strategy?
faq.answer: She invited the king and Haman to two banquets to set the stage for her request.

faq.question: What did Haman do in response to Mordecai?
faq.answer: He built a 75-foot gallows to have Mordecai hanged.
